text: Tapalapa bread is a traditional bread. It mainly is made in Senegal, Gambia and Guinea. It is shaped like a French baguette. It is served with akara, beans, steamed fish and other Gambian dishes. It is mainly made in local bakeries. It is sold by the Fulas in Gambia. Category:Breads Category:Senegalese food Category:Gambian food Category:Guinean food
title: Tapalapa bread
